thread.content:
We're starting our journey of 2018 candidates with everybody's favorite Marwen-set film: Robert Zemeckis's "Welcome to Marwen" (2018)!  Follow along on the hashtag #MARNOW25

#marwhen #marforever #maralways

Hello, I'm Hervey and I'll be commenting on Marwen today

Glad to be kicking off the 2018 screenings with this one #MARNOW25

Hello, I'm Alan and I'll be commenting on Marwen today. I'm excited to learn more about Marwen.

#MARNOW25

Forgot how much bass the Universal globe intro has. We're off to a great start.

#MARNOW25
Good auto-play trailers on this blu-ray, including "Second Act" (2018), a film I've never heard that somehow made 6x as much as Marwen #MARNOW25
Gotta love it when a film just starts right off with a title card. #MARNOW25
It was a digetic sign welcoming us to Marwen #MARNOW25
Steve Carell is perhaps the least convincing WWII fighter pilot. #MARNOW25

The plastic-doll CG sheen (a look only really attempted here and in Spielberg's Tintin movie) is, at least here, simply rather cheap looking

I think all the bad de-aging scenes we've seen in recent years has ruined our ability to appreciate this #MARNOW25
This film's aesthetic is "2010's video game cutscene" and it's kind of nostalgic. #MARNOW25
Wow, this toy soldier film has suddenly gotten graphically violent. #MARNOW25
Oh damn, I'm forgetting of Zemeckis's own run of "Polar Express", Scrooge, Beowulf, etc‒this absolutely is in the vein of that (and this looks less off tbh) #MARNOW25
Now exiting the world of Marwen #MARNOW25
Oh wow, this film does not take place solely in Marwen. I'm unhappy about this, but excited to see what follows. #MARNOW25
I do not think I could handle a film happening exclusively in Marwen for 1h56m #MARNOW25
Nice R.I.P. box. #MARNOW25 #RIPBox
Owning sick periscope binoculars like that has always been a dream, I'm so jealous #MARNOW25
Wow, they are both binoculars and sound scopes. This is impressive tech. #MARNOW25
I don't like the new neighbor's boyfriend for some reason, he seems like he might be a bad guy #MARNOW25
It's useful for a film to show mail to establish a character's full name and home address early in a movie, this should be standard #MARNOW25
His name is Mark! #MarwenMark #MarkMarwen #MARNOW25
Welcome to MarkHogcampWen #MARNOW25
Mark is a much better artist than Griffin #MARNOW25
It is very handy to have a doll that's a perfect likeness of your younger self. #MARNOW25
I'll be honest, after spending 10 pretty cloying and boring minutes outside of Marwen, I'm really happy to be back in Marwen #MARNOW25
I appreciate when the film returns to Marwen. #MARNOW25
The walkable downtown core of Marwen is very livable #MARNOW25

Wow, he also has a perfect likeness of Janelle Monae, his army rehab person

Are we supposed to assume that every doll must have a real-life antecedent? #MARNOW25
How were they so careless as to let a sniper into the Marwen bell tower? #MARNOW25
I think Deja enabled the sniper somehow #MARNOW25
"Well, no use crying over spilled milk" #ClassicMarwenLines #MarwenLines #LegendaryMovieLines #MARNOW25

Is the milkmaid doll permanently gone after Dejah zapped her?

A real shame, that doll had real potential; this is playtime with real consequences #MARNOW25
Nice trip-hop playing in the Marwen bar. #MARNOW25
Many are saying it: "Welcome to Marwen" (2018) walked so "Barbie" (2023) could run #MARNOW25
Oh no, we're back in the depressing real world. Take us back to Marwen! #MARNOW25
I believe Mark Hogcamp has PTSD. #MARNOW25
I believe this gunfire is real #MARNOW25

This is incredibly immersive cinema

I will clarify that the sound mix is *very* loud, and somewhat alarming #MARNOW25
Legitimately impressive transition from Marwen CG world car to real world car there. #MARNOW25
A very famous and on-the-nose needle drop: we're really watching Zemeckis now #MARNOW25
And another one #MARNOW25
Oh dear no, the transition from CG Mark to real Mark face was very, very bad. Much worse than the car transition. #MARNOW25
Lionel trains logo! #MARNOW25
Is the train store woman not notable enough to become one of his dolls? What an insult #MARNOW25
Very fortunate that the doll / train shop has a doll that looks just like Mark's new neighbor! #MARNOW25
"High end figures are SO cool!" #classicmovielines #MARNOW25
The subtlety with which they treat Mark's PTSD is the utmost in cinematic craft. #MARNOW25
Wow, he's being attacked by Nazis in the world of Marwen, Belgium as well as in Kingston, NY #MARNOW25
I'm eating crow, the hobby shop lady is one of his dolls, her big hairdo threw me off #MARNOW25
The only slight indignation elicited by the forced toplessness of the hobby shop lady's doll shows this to be a pre #MeToo production #MARNOW25
"Did someone say glaministas?" #ClassicMovieLines #MarwenLines #LinesOfMarwen #MARNOW25
We live in a world in which Barbies are called "Glamonistas" #glamonistas #glamonista #MARNOW25
"Nicol" spelled without the 'e' at the end? Unheard of. #MARNOW25
Great lore being unveiled, we're learning so much about his old neighbor Colleen and how sad we are to have seen her leave #MARNOW25
"I'm ready to fulfill any of your Glaminista needs." #ClassicMovieLines #MarwenLines #MARNOW25

1) Mark Hogcamp is very noticeably fixated on Nicol's high heels to the exclusion of everything else

2) We're going to have to get closure on Glamonista/Glaminista spelling at some point #TeamGlamonista #MARNOW25

This performance of real-world Mark toes the line between "fragile and damaged" and "creepy and offputting"

When Carrell crosses his eyes slightly and mumbles about this stilettos, I think it's too much in the latter camp #MARNOW25
Drinks on bar: pint of beer with a LOT of head in it (recently poured?), Jack Daniels, red wine (Mouton?), gin or vodka. #MARNOW25
NOW WE'RE ROCKING. #MARNOW25
Even when he's crossing several lines of creepy behavior, everybody in Kingston, NY is incredibly kind and accepting of Mark Hogcamp (except for the neonazis who assault him) #MARNOW25
A pistol with a lighter on the end of it is so handy! #MARNOW25
I wonder if Mark is actually lighting his high-end military dolls on fire #MARNOW25
I'm curious whether the movie presents Mark's obsessive shoe fetish as a problem to be overcome, or just a neutral character feature we're supposed to accept #MARNOW25
"I like to wear heels sometimes" followed by "I LOVE DAMES". Seems like he is over-compensating a bit here. #MARNOW25
It's meatball day #MARNOW25
It's meatball day! #MARNOW25
Glad to see how the photos turned out, they look great #MARNOW25
Uh oh, we've got trouble, as "Cat Scratch Fever" attests to. #MARNOW25
Oh right, in addition to the Nazis there is one bad non-nazi person in the world #MARNOW25

Nicol's brother is a bigger shoe and underwear pervert than Mark, making him seem more normal

#classicscreenwriting #MARNOW25
Mark was apparently targeted by the Nazis over an innocuous line about "liking to collect women's essence" #MARNOW25
Between "Stand By Your Man" and "Cat Scratch Fever", we can see how classic tunes are becoming a signal of danger in this film. #TunesEqualDanger #MARNOW25

I think this film has had an awkward time adapting the sad details of a real-life story to this cartoonish town

Every line about trauma and mental dysfunction is immediately followed by a gag #MARNOW25
Nicol's boyfriend may be a nazi #MARNOW25
It's meatball day again! #MARNOW25
Lawyer Mr Johnson's undershirt is very visible through his dress shirt #MARNOW25
That's how you know he's a small-town lawyer. #MARNOW25
Prediction: the courtroom judge will be Dejah #MARNOW25
"I never go anywhere without my backup." #ClassicMovieLines #MarwenLines #MARNOW25
Count of Ulster! What is this, Ireland? #MARNOW25
The shot of the Steve Carrell doll on the chair is very charming and funny, less is more #MARNOW25
16 day delay in courtroom proceedings #MARNOW25
Even the charmed world of "Wicked Hotel Encounters" is not safe from nazis #MARNOW25
This sort of storytelling was just not possible before the invention of CG films. #MARNOW25
Kurt! We have a name for Nicol's ex-boyfriend. #MARNOW25
Careful viewers will notice several more red flags with Nicol's ex-boyfriend #MARNOW25
Wow, Mark has just lucked into the mother lode of shoes. A whole bag! #MARNOW25

I think the major issue I have with the movie is how unclear it is whether the people of Kingston view Mark as an equal, or are extremely patronizing to him

It seems to swing wildly between the two #MARNOW25
The people of Kingston really have quite a bit of free time to be patronizing and/or supportive of Mark. #MARNOW25
"Cool." #classicmovielines #MARNOW25
Thursday at 4 o'clock is destined to be a tea time to remember. I wonder if Kurt will make an appearance. #MARNOW25
Carrell's performance as irl Mark also wildly swings between "about as charming as he normally is, but clearly traumatized and hurt" and "the most offputting person you've ever seen" #MARNOW25
Song selection as Mark's imagination gets away from him: "It's Just My Imagination (Getting Away from Me)" #MARNOW25

I don't know that Deja needed to declare once again that she is the "Belgian witch of Marwen". We already know this, as it's been said several times. Perhaps this film was optimized for second-screen viewing? #MARNOW25
Mark is playing with fire: the crime of stolen valour #MARNOW25
I like to think that Mark just assumes a tea house needs to be shaped like a tea pot. #MARNOW25

Nicol must be incredibly charmed

Mark should charm her further by showing her simulated sex acts between the Mark doll and the Nicol glamonista #MARNOW25
The photos of the dolls are quite good. #MARNOW25
Ughghhhghhggggggg #MARNOW25
Oh no, what a disaster. This is a disaster. #MARNOW25
"Mark, get up. Get up now." #ClassicMovieLines #MarwenLines #MARNOW25
This is fine, Mark should simply propose to one of the other six women in town who are clearly in love with him #MARNOW25
Steve Carell being completely frozen holding a purple heart for several minutes in this scene is extremely good. #MARNOW25
I frankly don't know if it's good or bad, but it's hard to overstate how tonally *weird* this movie is #MARNOW25
Well this was a tea time to remember, but where is Kurt? #MARNOW25
I think Kurt and Dejah were conspiring behind the scenes to trick Nicol into falling out of love with Mark #MARNOW25
Zemeckis sure loves time-traveling vehicles. #MARNOW25
Oh wow, I didn't even clock that as self-homage at first #MARNOW25
Nicol gifted Mark nazi-Kurt #MARNOW25
"Figures of Fury" is a totally normal doll series for people who appreciate finely crafted dolls of SS military men. #MARNOW25
Woah, full sized Hoagie! #MARNOW25
We've seen full-sized Hoagie before. He saved Mark from the gunfire in the courtroom. #MARNOW25
Aaaaaaand credits! Love a good ending. #MARNOW25
I think he *became* Hoagie then, here he's talking to Hoagie in the room #MARNOW25
It seems like a healthy outlet that he's able to work through his emotions by having Nicol shot #MARNOW25
Dejah made a persuasive argument for taking a large handful of pills #MARNOW25
Does dumping pills in the sink work? I guess they can dissolve in water, so that might check out. #DumpingPills #MARNOW25
The film is leaning heavily on "shoe fetish" acceptance/liberation, but honestly it's fairly low on the list for what's offputting about Mark #MARNOW25
The time machine car flies! This checks out. #MARNOW25
Mark's core problem is how he depends on having the women in life be his personal savior, which makes his "Womens are the saviors of the world!" line honestly really troubling here #MARNOW25
I could not care less about the stakes of this battle. He's going to extreme heroics to avoid leaving Nicol's shoe behind? Why are we supposed to care about that? #MARNOW25

I was literally just going to tweet puzzlingly about the stakes here

Some mapping between this action sequence and *anything* that matters would help this land more

Looks pretty cool though #MARNOW25
OK, the flaming tracks of the time machine car are a bit much at this point. #MARNOW25
I'd like to compare this against Ready Player One to see what's more guilty of shameless nostalgia for BTTF #MARNOW25
Impressive subsurface scattering on Nicol's bandages. #SubsurfaceScattering #CGMastery #MARNOW25

I'm calling it: this is canon

#BackToTheFuturePart4 #MARNOW25
Ahhh, a garbage disposal for the pills! It makes sense now. #DumpingPills #MARNOW25
So the moral of the story is that if you're suffering from PTSD your medication may be the problem? OK. #MARNOW25
Only if the medicine is being peddled by nazi witches (more common than you think!) #MARNOW25

Mark has cut out all the toxic nazis from his life

#byebyenazis #MARNOW25
I think we need to hear from the defense. #MARNOW25
Mark has touched the hearts of the neonazis, now sniffling on the defendants' stand #MARNOW25
Wow, this small town has a very swanky art museum. #MARNOW25
Downtown Kingston, NY nightlife is world-class #MARNOW25
We haven't seen Kurt in a long time. What's the latest with Kurt? I was expecting a bigger payoff there. #MARNOW25
Kurt was the main nazi in the big BTTF-homage scene #MARNOW25

He is shown to be processing his rejection by Nicol by going forward with their marriage in the world of Marwen, and adding her name to the town's name? Seems like a healthy, heartwarming ending #MARNOW25
Mark's true love was right there in front of him the whole time! #MARNOW25
Roberta the hobby shop lady exists to be settled for #MARNOW25
If you can't have Nicole, there's always Roberta. What a film! #MARNOW25
Nicol* #MARNOW25
Marwen has become manhattanized #MARNOW25
My review: What a film. We should not do that one. #MARNOW25
It's an antic film with a lot of content, but honestly the basic tonal problems with the movie make spending 50 hours with seem like an unappealing idea #MARNOW25
